DOC.brief_summary: To assess defibrillation efficacy subcutaneous defibrillation system .
DOC.criteria: Subject must undergo implant commercially approve ICD system Subject must willing provide Informed Consent Subject must > 18 year old Subject impaired kidney function measure glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) estimate < 29 mls/min/1.73m2 ( record last six month ) Subject high risk infection Subject EF < 15 % Subject high risk stroke device replacement Subject implant active nonICD device , cardiac noncardiac ( e.g. , Neuro stimulator , Pacemaker ) Subject indicate CRT Subject pacemaker dependent Subject enrol concurrent study may confound result study Subject medical condition would limit study participation Subject pregnant Subject meet exclusion criterion require local law ( e.g . age , breast feeding , etc . )
